body_html:
From the logs, it actually find gloo, compile it, but when moving to THD, even though the library is found properly, it's include path is empty (and not passed to the compiler command).
@apaszke should know who can help debug this further?

body:
From the logs, it actually find gloo, compile it, but when moving to THD, even though the library is found properly, it's include path is empty (and not passed to the compiler command).
@apaszke should know who can help debug this further?
